attributes.action: Stop Immigration and save the english
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Add your signiture and be proud to be english, our country is slowly being diluted down to nothing we have a superb heritage and history that seems to be being eroded away.
This is a call to all true englishmen.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
